name: Cat Your Life on It
description:
This is a game about two cats betting their lifes on a game that will cost their lifes

How to play:
(This can be played as 1 versus 1 player)
Push the slider to the right on each cat`s turn and very carefully waits for the gun to shoot, once it shoots you can drag it to the left again, if you keep on the right it you will keep shooting your cat
There are 30 bullets, 14 lethal that will kill the cat and 16 fake that will not kill the cat
The one who loses is the first cat to die, it is more of a competition to see which is the luckiest cat, in this case the cat that will take less lethal bullets

Made by Ivan Garcia and Elvis Leite for Ludum Dare 44
